participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, Emily enjoys engaging in activities that foster personal growth and creativity.
participant_1.background: My favorite fruit is watermelon because it is sweet and refreshing. I will one day own a ferret. My daily routine is pretty relaxed as I'm taking a year off before college, but I like to make sure I keep busy and get some reading in on the weekends. I pretended to be a superhero with my kids and they loved it. I volunteer in my son’s boy scout troop.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Reflective and independent, Liam values solitude and finds joy in pursuing his own interests.
participant_2.background: My avatar can swim, but I myself cannot. I am not close with my family and I prefer to spend time alone. I sell clothing on Facebook. I drive a Ford truck. I was raised by my single mother, and she did a great job.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read books and I like to go swimming!
I love reading too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love anything by James Patterson or Clive Cussler.
I haven't read anything by either of them before, but I've heard good things. What are some of your favorite things about their books?
I love the way they build suspense and the characters are always so well developed.
I'll have to check them out! I'm always looking for new books to read.
You won't be disappointed!
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go swimming, but I can't because I don't know how to.
That's too bad! I love swimming. It's so relaxing and it's a great way to get exercise.
I wish I could swim. It looks so fun!
You should take a lesson! It's not as hard as it looks.
I might have to! I'm always looking for new things to try.
I'm glad you're open to trying new things! It's the best way to find new interests.
Me too! I love trying new things. It makes life more exciting.
I agree! I think that's a great attitude to have.
Thanks! I try to have a positive outlook on life.
Me too! It's the best way to live.
I agree!
I'm glad we agree on something!
Me too!
